Extract activity.zip to current directory creating activity.csv  

Read activity.csv into activity data frame
```{r, echo=TRUE}
activity <- read.csv("activity.csv")
summary(activity)  
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = activity) + geom_histogram(aes(x=steps))
stepmean <- mean(activity$steps, na.rm = TRUE)
stepmean
stepmedian <- median(activity$steps, na.rm = TRUE)
stepmedian
qplot(activity$interval, activity$steps, type = "1")
```
